select count(*) from ko_restaurant
select r.res_no,r.res_name,r.res_info,r.res_tel,r.res_loc,res_image,r.start_time,r.end_time from (select row_number() over(order by no desc) as res_no,res_name,res_info,res_tel, res_loc,res_image,start_time,end_time from ko_restaurant) r, ko_member m where r.id=m.id and r.res_no between #{getStartRowNumber} and #{getEndRowNumber}
